# The `MIRPrinter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class prints out the machine functions using the MIR serialization format. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MIRPrinter</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class prints out the machine functions using the MIR serialization format.

Definition at line 102 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/mirprinter-cpp">MIRPrinter.cpp</a>.
